summary.span: 傳回這個平面物件的字串表示。

span.span: Returns the string representation of this plane object.

returns.span: 表示這個 物件的字串。

span.span: A string that represents this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字串表示物件使用目前文化特性的格式化慣例來格式化數字的值傳回的字串中。The string representation of a object use the formatting conventions of the current culture to format the numeric values in the returned string. 例如，其字串表示會使用 EN-US 文化特性的慣例來格式化的物件可能會顯示為`{Normal:<1.1, 2.2, 3.3> D:4.4}`。For example, a object whose string representation is formatted by using the conventions of the en-US culture might appear as `{Normal:<1.1, 2.2, 3.3> D:4.4}`.

span.span: Transforms a normalized plane by a 4x4 matrix.
The transformed plane.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `plane` 必須已標準化，讓其向量為單位長度之前呼叫這個方法。`plane` must already be normalized so that its vector is of unit length before this method is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `plane` 必須已標準化，讓其向量為單位長度之前呼叫這個方法。`plane` must already be normalized so that its vector is of unit length before this method is called.
